sub_title: MSc Student Food Safety at Wageningen University & Research | Food Microbiology Researcher
summary:
I am currently an MSc student in Food Safety, specializing in Applied Food Safety Microbiology at Wageningen University and Research class of 2024, the study is fully funded by an LPDP scholarship from the Ministry of Finance, Republic of Indonesia 2022 - 2024. I actively participate in non-academic and leadership roles activities such as the Nicolas Appert study association, Indonesia Student Association (PPI) in Wageningen, IAAS Netherlands, and the international Delta global project.

Previously graduated with a BSc in Biology with a minor study in Microbiology, awarded as the best graduate representative of the Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Science, Indonesia University of Education class of 2020 (cGPA 3.88 out of 4.00 - Magna cum laude), and the study was fully funded by Beasiswa Unggulan Masyarakat Berprestasi Scholarship from the Ministry of Education and Culture, Republic of Indonesia 2017 - 2020. During my bachelor's study, I was assigned as a lecturer's assistant for microbiology, biotechnology, genetics, plant and animal physiology, and biochemistry courses, as well as did my internship as a research assistant at the Laboratory of Microbiology, Faculty of Food Science and Technology, University Putra Malaysia.

I have a broad interest in food safety research, academia, and industry, with a specialization in applied food safety and food microbiology. Having one year of experience in food microbiological research at a university institution and two years of experience in teaching international curriculum education for A-Level Biology and private education consultation. 
Having experience in finding scholarships abroad (I was accepted for some scholarships: LPDP, Fulbright, DAAD, Searca, Stipendium Hungaricum, Turkiye Burslari, and Beasiswa Unggulan), I also enjoy talking and sharing about everything related to scholarships opportunity to study abroad with my fellow connection.

awards.title: 3rd place in LPDP Entrepreneur Business Plan Competition 2021
awards.description: Leader of the team and founder of the invented project in national scale entrepreneurship and business competition that was held by LPDP, Ministry of Finance, Indonesia.
awards.issuer: Lembaga Pengelola Dana Pendidikan by Ministry of Finance of Indonesia

awards.title: Awardee of Lembaga Pengelola Dana Pendidikan (Indonesia Endowment Fund for Education) PK-173
awards.description:
Fully-funded merit-based scholarship for graduate students by the Ministry of Finance of Indonesia.
Funding for Master’s degree in Food Safety, Wageningen University and Research 2022/2023.

awards.title: The Best Graduate Representative of Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Science
awards.description: Highest GPA (3.88 out of 4.00 - Magna cum laude) with the most achievements graduate predicate 2020

awards.title: Recipient of 2 national awards at UPI Student Achievements Award
awards.description: The annual event was held by the rectorate of Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia to reward students who have achieved both national and international achievement levels. The event was participated by 80 students from different departments and faculty.

awards.title: Recipient of Entrepreneur Student Program Award
awards.description: Annual competition held by Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Science, Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia to reward students who have the willingness to be a creative entrepreneur in university scope.
awards.issuer: Ministry of Education and Culture of Indonesia

awards.title: Delegation of ON-MIPA (National Mathematics and Science Olympiad)
awards.description: National Representative of Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia for Biology Subject in 2017, 2018, and 2019.
awards.issuer: Ministry of Research and Technology of Indonesia

awards.title: 2nd place in The Most Outstanding Student Competition
awards.description: Annual competition held by the Indonesia University of Education to find the most outstanding student from every department with the highest GPA and have the most achievements both at national and international levels and require the candidates to conduct research based on current SDG issues that rely on their background studies. The competition was participated by students with the highest GPA and who have the most achievements that represent each department/faculty.

awards.title: 1st runner up of Agriculture National Scientific Writing Competition
awards.description: The competition was held by Riau University and participated by the students from many universities from Indonesia at national levels. The competition is related to optimizing the agriculture sector in Indonesia and I wrote about innovation in optimizing Coix lacrima-jobi (Indonesian endemic plant) as a dietary snack.

awards.title: 2nd place in National Scientific Writing Competition 73 Wajah Indonesia
awards.description: The competition was held by Gadjah Mada University that participated in about 100 teams/persons from every university from Indonesia at national levels. This competition aims to find the best scientific written that works on solutions to the problems currently facing Indonesia. I wrote and provided the idea of simple bioreactor-based fishing boats to process marine organism waste into wet and dry fertilizer products with the help of optimizing the use of certain microbial consortia.

awards.title: 3rd place in National Scientific Writing Competition Aqualine Festival Indonesia
awards.description: The competition was held by Mataram University and participated by the students from many universities from Indonesia at national levels. The competition is related to optimizing the sea product and I put an effort to write about the antibacterial activity of waste from Crustaceans and its application as an additional substance in the textile industry.

awards.title: Finalist in Funding of Student Creativity Program Competition
awards.description: The competition was held by the Ministry of Research and Technology and the research was conducted for 6 months in the Research and Biotechnology Laboratory, Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia, and Ranca Upas area which is consists of 3 persons. The research was about identifying the species of endemic and non-endemic frogs, taking samples of frog skin secretions, extracting frog's skin secretions, and conducting several antibacterial bioactivities.
awards.issuer: Ministry of Research and Technology of Indonesia

awards.title: Recipient of Full Scholarship Beasiswa Unggulan Kategori Masyarakat Berprestasi
awards.description:
Fully-funded merit-based scholarship for undergraduate students by the Ministry of Education and Culture of Indonesia.
Funding for Bachelor’s degree in Biology, Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia 2017 - 2020.
awards.issuer: Ministry of Education and Culture of Indonesia

Master of Science Biotechnology SITH ITB
TAB Production Supervisor of Veterinary Vaccine

projects.title: Antibacterial Activity of Piper cubeba L. Raw Berries Extract against Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA)
projects.description:
The research was conducted as a thesis project for a Bachelor’s degree at the Laboratory of Research and Biotechnology of Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia.
This research aimed to find the most effective concentration of the Piper cubeba extract that could inhibit the MRSA culture through DDA, MIC, MBC, and time kill assay methods.
This project was graded 4 out of 4 (A) by the thesis defense examiner.

contributors.headline: MSc Student Food Safety at Wageningen University & Research | Food Microbiology Researcher

projects.title: Antistaphylococcal, Anticancidal, and Antiacnes activity of Piper cubeba L.
projects.description:
The research was conducted at the Laboratory of Microbiology, Faculty of Food Science and Technology, University Putra Malaysia, and aimed to find the most effective concentration of the plant extract that could inhibit and kill the cultures of several food contaminant microorganisms.
This project was graded 4 out of 4 (A) by the internship defense examiner.

contributors.headline: MSc Student Food Safety at Wageningen University & Research | Food Microbiology Researcher

projects.title: Pekanik Ship (Modern Environmental Friendly Fishing Ship as an Effort in Optimizing the Utilization of Organic Sea Waste)
projects.description: The project was published in the “73 Wajah Indonesia” book by Gadjah Mada University as a recognition of the 2nd winner of the national competition in 2018.

contributors.headline: MSc Student Food Safety at Wageningen University & Research | Food Microbiology Researcher

projects.title: Coix-bar (Innovative Snack Bar Using Coix lacryma-jobi as a Source of Highly Nutritious Local Food)
projects.description:
The project was proposed for the National Agriculture Competition by Riau University and managed to be the 1st runner-up of the competition.
The project was emphasizing the use of Coix-lacryma jobi (Biji Hanjeli) as a native and local plant of Indonesia as a snack bar with high nutrients and low calories.

contributors.headline: MSc Student Food Safety at Wageningen University & Research | Food Microbiology Researcher
TAB Production Supervisor of Veterinary Vaccine

projects.title: Antibacterial Bioactivity of Endemic and Non-Endemic Frog Skin Secretion against Staphylococcus aureus and Streptococcus mutans
projects.description: The research was funded and provided by the Ministry of Research and Technology of Indonesia through National Student Creativity Program Competition and became the national finalist of the event. The research was conducted for 6 months in Ranca Upas, Bandung. Identifying the species of tested frogs, taking a sample of frog skin secretions, extracting frog's skin secretions, and conducting several antibacterial bioactivities.

test_scores.name: Coursera Teaching for Learning by Commonwealth Education Trust

profile_positions.description:
Schoters is an ed-tech startup company that aims to facilitate candidates who want to pursue study abroad from bachelor's to doctorate degrees.
Assisted, facilitated, and supervised 47 students in preparation for study abroad with or without scholarships, analyzed the students' educational backgrounds, and profiled checking for their intended educational program.
